languages.text: Я готов поклясться, что установка силового контура генератора номер шесть была отключена, когда мы начали варп-прыжок. В конструкции были трещины, повреждения кожуха. Мы вообще не имели права запускать этот хлам, он взорвался бы через секунду. И я не знаю, как он включился. Никто из команды его не трогал. Когда последний генератор вышел из строя, подача энергии должна была прекратиться, но... Машина номер шесть работала. Она тащила нас восемнадцать минут. Хотя должна была взорваться за восемнадцать миллисекунд. Я не знаю, как так вышло. Император защищает.

traits.locale_text: Я готов поклясться, что установка силового контура генератора номер шесть была отключена, когда мы начали варп-прыжок. В конструкции были трещины, микро-повреждения кожуха. Мы вообще не имели права запускать этот хлам, он взорвался бы через секунду. И я не знаю, как он включился. Никто из команды его не трогал. Когда последний генератор вышел из строя, подача энергии должна была прекратиться, но... Машина номер шесть работала. Она тащила нас восемнадцать минут. Хотя должна была взорваться за восемнадцать миллисекунд. Я не знаю, как так вышло. Император защищает.

languages.text: I would be willing to swear that generator 6's power circuit unit was switched off when we began the warp jump. There were cracks in the casing, the enclosure was damaged. We would never start up that piece of junk, it would have blown in seconds. And I have no idea how it switched itself on. No one from the crew touched it. When the last generator failed, the energy supply should have been cut off, but... number 6 continued to run. It dragged us along for 18 minutes. Even though it should have exploded after 18 milliseconds. I don't know how that happened. The Emperor protects.
languages.original_text: Я готов поклясться, что установка силового контура генератора номер шесть была отключена, когда мы начали варп-прыжок. В конструкции были трещины, повреждения кожуха. Мы вообще не имели права запускать этот хлам, он взорвался бы через секунду. И я не знаю, как он включился. Никто из команды его не трогал. Когда последний генератор вышел из строя, подача энергии должна была прекратиться, но... Машина номер шесть работала. Она тащила нас восемнадцать минут. Хотя должна была взорваться за восемнадцать миллисекунд. Я не знаю, как так вышло. Император защищает.

traits.locale_text: I would be willing to swear that generator 6's power circuit unit was switched off when we began the warp jump. There were cracks in the casing, the enclosure was damaged. We would never start up that piece of junk, it would have blown in seconds. And I have no idea how it switched itself on. No one from the team touched it. When the last generator failed, the energy supply should have been cut off, but... number 6 continued to run. It dragged us along for 18 minutes. Even though it should have exploded after 18 milliseconds. I don't know how that happened. The Emperor protects.

I would be willing to swear that generator 6's power circuit unit was switched off when we began the warp jump. There were cracks in the casing, the enclosure was damaged. We would never start up that piece of junk, it would have blown in seconds. And I have no idea how it switched itself on. No one from the team touched it. When the last generator failed, the energy supply should have been cut off, but... number 6 continued to run. It dragged us along for 18 minutes. Even though it should have exploded after 18 milliseconds. I don't know how that happened. The Emperor protects.

I would be willing to swear that generator 6's power circuit unit was switched off when we began the warp jump. There were cracks in the casing, the enclosure was damaged. We would never start up that piece of junk, it would have blown in seconds. And I have no idea how it switched itself on. No one from the team touched it. When the last generator failed, the energy supply should have been cut off, but... number 6 continued to run. It dragged us along for 18 minutes. Even though it should have exploded after 18 milliseconds. I don't know how that happened. The Emperor protects.

I would be willing to swear that generator 6's power circuit unit was switched off when we began the warp jump. There were cracks in the casing, the enclosure was damaged. We would never start up that piece of junk, it would have blown in seconds. And I have no idea how it switched itself on. No one from the crew touched it. When the last generator failed, the energy supply should have been cut off, but... number 6 continued to run. It dragged us along for 18 minutes. Even though it should have exploded after 18 milliseconds. I don't know how that happened. The Emperor protects.

languages.text: Me atrevería a jurar que el circuito de energía del generador 6 estaba desconectado al iniciar el salto de disformidad. La carcasa estaba agrietada y el recinto dañado. No podíamos hacer que esa chatarra arrancara porque explotaría en cuestión de segundos. Así que no sé cómo ha podido activarse. Nadie de la tripulación lo ha tocado. Cuando el último generador ha fallado, el suministro de energía debería haberse interrumpido, pero... el número seis ha seguido funcionando. Nos ha impulsado durante 18 minutos, cuando debería haber explotado a los 18 milisegundos. No sé lo que ha pasado. El Emperador protege.
languages.original_text: I would be willing to swear that generator 6's power circuit unit was switched off when we began the warp jump. There were cracks in the casing, the enclosure was damaged. We would never start up that piece of junk, it would have blown in seconds. And I have no idea how it switched itself on. No one from the crew touched it. When the last generator failed, the energy supply should have been cut off, but... number 6 continued to run. It dragged us along for 18 minutes. Even though it should have exploded after 18 milliseconds. I don't know how that happened. The Emperor protects.

traits.locale_text: Me atrevería a jurar que el circuito de energía del generador 6 estaba desconectado al iniciar el salto de disformidad. La carcasa estaba agrietada y el recinto dañado. No podíamos hacer que esa chatarra arrancara porque explotaría en cuestión de segundos. Así que no sé cómo ha podido activarse. Nadie del equipo lo ha tocado. Cuando el último generador ha fallado, el suministro de energía debería haberse interrumpido, pero... el número seis ha seguido funcionando. Nos ha impulsado durante 18 minutos, cuando debería haber explotado a los 18 milisegundos. No sé lo que ha pasado. El Emperador protege.

languages.text: 我敢发誓，亚空间跳跃刚开始的时候，我们就把6号发电机关掉了。那台发电机外壳裂了，机身也损坏了。我们绝对不会再打开那堆破铜烂铁，因为它过不了几秒就会爆炸。我也不知道它到底是怎么打开的，我们根本没有人碰过它。当最后一台发电机发生故障熄火的时候，能量供应本该被切断才对，可是……6号发电机依然在继续运行。它本该在18毫秒之后就爆炸，但却硬是拖着我们走了18分钟。我不知道这到底是怎么回事，肯定是帝皇在庇佑我们。
languages.original_text: I would be willing to swear that generator 6's power circuit unit was switched off when we began the warp jump. There were cracks in the casing, the enclosure was damaged. We would never start up that piece of junk, it would have blown in seconds. And I have no idea how it switched itself on. No one from the crew touched it. When the last generator failed, the energy supply should have been cut off, but... number 6 continued to run. It dragged us along for 18 minutes. Even though it should have exploded after 18 milliseconds. I don't know how that happened. The Emperor protects.

traits.locale_text: 我敢发誓，亚空间跳跃刚开始的时候，我们就把6号发电机关掉了。那台发电机外壳裂了，机身也损坏了。我们绝对不会再打开那堆破铜烂铁，因为它过不了几秒就会爆炸。我也不知道它到底是怎么打开的，我们根本没有人碰过它。当最后一台发电机发生故障熄火的时候，能量供应本该被切断才对，可是……6号发电机依然在继续运行。它本该在18毫秒之后就爆炸，但却硬是拖着我们走了18分钟。我不知道这到底是怎么回事，帝皇在庇佑我们。

languages.text: 私には誓って断言できることがあります。それは、ワープジャンプを開始したとき、ジェネレイター6号機の電源回路ユニットはオフになっていたということです。本体には亀裂があって破損していた。そのガラクタを起動するなんて絶対にありません。一瞬で吹き飛んでしまうでしょう。それに、どのようにしてスイッチが入ったのかも分からない。触れたクルーは誰もいないのですから。最後のジェネレイターが故障したときに、エネルギー供給は遮断されるはずだったのに…6号機は運転を続けていたのです。18分も持ってくれました。 18ミリ秒後に爆発するはずだったのに。なぜそうなったのかサッパリです。皇帝の加護があらんことを。
languages.original_text: I would be willing to swear that generator 6's power circuit unit was switched off when we began the warp jump. There were cracks in the casing, the enclosure was damaged. We would never start up that piece of junk, it would have blown in seconds. And I have no idea how it switched itself on. No one from the crew touched it. When the last generator failed, the energy supply should have been cut off, but... number 6 continued to run. It dragged us along for 18 minutes. Even though it should have exploded after 18 milliseconds. I don't know how that happened. The Emperor protects.

traits.locale_text: 私には誓って断言できることがあります。それは、ワープジャンプを開始したとき、ジェネレイター6号機の電源回路ユニットはオフになっていたということです。本体には亀裂があって破損していた。そのガラクタを起動するなんて絶対にありません。一瞬で吹き飛んでしまうでしょう。それに、どのようにしてスイッチが入ったのかも分からない。触れたクルーは誰もいないのですから。最後のジェネレイターが故障したときに、エネルギー供給は遮断されるはずだったのに…6号機は運転を続けていたのです。18分も持ってくれました。 18ミリ秒後に爆発するはずだったのに。なぜそうなったのかサッパリです。皇帝の加護があらんことを。

languages.text: Ich würde schwören, dass der Stromkreislauf von Generator 6 ausgeschaltet war, als wir den Warpsprung begannen. Es gab Risse im Gehäuse, die Ummantelung war beschädigt. Wir hätten diesen Schrotthaufen nie in Betrieb genommen, er wäre in Sekundenschnelle explodiert. Und ich habe keine Ahnung, wie es sich selbst eingeschaltet hat. Keiner aus der Crew hat ihn angefasst. Als der letzte Generator ausfiel, hätte die Energieversorgung unterbrochen werden müssen, aber... Nummer 6 lief weiter. Er hat uns 18 Minuten lang mitgeschleppt. Obwohl er nach 18 Millisekunden hätte explodieren müssen. Ich weiß nicht, wie das passiert ist. Der Imperator beschützt.
languages.original_text: I would be willing to swear that generator 6's power circuit unit was switched off when we began the warp jump. There were cracks in the casing, the enclosure was damaged. We would never start up that piece of junk, it would have blown in seconds. And I have no idea how it switched itself on. No one from the crew touched it. When the last generator failed, the energy supply should have been cut off, but... number 6 continued to run. It dragged us along for 18 minutes. Even though it should have exploded after 18 milliseconds. I don't know how that happened. The Emperor protects.

languages.text: Je pourrais jurer que le circuit d'alimentation du générateur 6 était coupé lorsque nous avons commencé le saut Warp. Le carter était fissuré, et l'enceinte était endommagée. Nous n'aurions jamais mis en marche ce tas de ferraille, sous peine de le voir exploser en quelques secondes. Je ne comprends toujours pas comment il s'est allumé. Aucun membre de l'équipage n'y a touché. Lorsque le dernier générateur est tombé en panne, l'alimentation aurait dû être coupée, mais... le numéro 6 ne s'est pas arrêté. Il a tourné pendant 18 minutes. Alors qu'il aurait dû exploser en 18 millisecondes. Je ne sais pas comment cela a pu se produire. L'Empereur nous protège.
languages.original_text: I would be willing to swear that generator 6's power circuit unit was switched off when we began the warp jump. There were cracks in the casing, the enclosure was damaged. We would never start up that piece of junk, it would have blown in seconds. And I have no idea how it switched itself on. No one from the crew touched it. When the last generator failed, the energy supply should have been cut off, but... number 6 continued to run. It dragged us along for 18 minutes. Even though it should have exploded after 18 milliseconds. I don't know how that happened. The Emperor protects.

traits.locale_text: Je pourrais jurer que le circuit d'alimentation du générateur 6 était coupé lorsque nous avons commencé le saut Warp. Le carter était fissuré, et l'enceinte était endommagée. Nous n'aurions jamais mis en marche ce tas de ferraille, sous peine de le voir exploser en quelques secondes. Je ne comprends toujours pas comment il s'est allumé. Aucun membre de l'équipe n'y a touché. Lorsque le dernier générateur est tombé en panne, l'alimentation aurait dû être coupée, mais... le numéro 6 ne s'est pas arrêté. Il a tourné pendant 18 minutes. Alors qu'il aurait dû exploser en 18 millisecondes. Je ne sais pas comment cela a pu se produire. L'Empereur nous protège.

languages.text: 6. jeneratörün güç devresi ünitesinin öte sıçrama başlamadan önce kapalı olduğuna yemin edebilirim. Kasada çatlaklar vardı, koruyucu kaplaması hasarlıydı. O hurdayı asla çalıştırmazdık zira saniyeler içinde infilak ederdi. Kendi kendine nasıl çalışmış, hiçbir fikrim yok. Mürettebattan ona dokunan bile olmadı. Son jeneratör de arızaya geçtikten sonra enerji akımının kesilmiş olması gerekirdi ama... 6 numara çalışmaya devam etti. Esasında 18 milisaniyede patlaması gerekirken sayesinde 18 dakika daha hareket hâlinde kalabildik. Nasıl oldu, bilemiyorum. İmparator korur.
languages.original_text: I would be willing to swear that generator 6's power circuit unit was switched off when we began the warp jump. There were cracks in the casing, the enclosure was damaged. We would never start up that piece of junk, it would have blown in seconds. And I have no idea how it switched itself on. No one from the crew touched it. When the last generator failed, the energy supply should have been cut off, but... number 6 continued to run. It dragged us along for 18 minutes. Even though it should have exploded after 18 milliseconds. I don't know how that happened. The Emperor protects.

traits.locale_text: 6. jeneratörün güç devresi ünitesinin öte sıçrama başlamadan önce kapalı olduğuna yemin edebilirim. Kasada çatlaklar vardı, haznesi hasarlıydı. Hurda parçasını asla çalışmaz, saniyeler içinde infilak ederdi. Kendi kendine nasıl çalışmış hiçbir fikrim yok. Mürettebattan kimse ona dokunmadı bile. Son jeneratör de devre dışı kaldıktan sonra enerji akımının kesilmiş olması gerekirdi ama 6 numara çalışmaya devam etti. Esasında 18 milisaniyede patlaması gerekirken sayesinde 18 dakika daha hareket hâlinde kalabildik. Bu nasıl oldu bilmiyorum. İmparator korur.
